message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think you'd be a great fit for it. I'm asking for $12,000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your time and effort. However, considering my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $9,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go lower than $10,500. This product is worth a lot to me, and I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you too.

Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I understand the value of the product to you, but unfortunately, I cannot meet your current offer. I would like to propose $10,000 for the product, if that would be acceptable to you.
